name: Safe Spot
description:
// controles are Q,E,Z,C gonna be updated later with more options

finish the puzzle discover the mechanics

win by delevering furnace(black cube) to furnace place (black platform) and the refrigertor(white cube) to refrigerator place(white platform) 

note furnace(black cube) cant be moved unless health is high enough or push it with a refrigerator

the platform that have snowflakes particles works as healer for health
